exceptions.unknown account #0: Please make sure that your wallet is connected.
exceptions.execution reverted: token count is out o: You can only purchase between 5 and 10000 AROMAs at once.
exceptions.execution reverted: sent MATIC below the: Price has changed since submitting the transaction. Please try again.
exceptions.execution reverted: Sale is paused: The sale is currently paused. Please try again later.
exceptions.execution reverted: tranfering AROMA fai: Something must have gone wrong during the transfer. Please ask our support,
exceptions.this recipe is taken: Oh snap! This recipe is already taken. Try with other ingredients.
exceptions.total coin percentage is not 100: The total percentage of the selected coin pairs must be 100%. Amend the percentages accordingly.
exceptions.percentage of a coin incremental of 5: The percentages must be divisible by 5. Amend the percentages accordingly.
exceptions.coin is not supported: One of the coin pairs is not supported. Please ask our support.

exceptions.example: READ THIS! This is the format to use if a function requires special treatment. Otherwise, just paste it above
